record.title: PERMISSION TO REDUCE TIME FOR ELECTRONIC VOTING DURING CONSIDERATION OF H.R. 1585, NATIONAL DEFENSE AUTHORIZATION ACT FOR FISCAL YEAR 2008

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that votes in series be reduced to 2 minutes.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Missouri?

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I object. The minority has not cleared this.
